title: Virtual Synchronous Continuing Professional Development (CPD) Webinar Course for Rural Universities

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Science Knowledge and Entry-Level Expertise in Relevant Fields (Medical/Legal/Technical)
context.additional_context: A short-term intensive webinar-based course for non-degree-seeking adult learners in rural areas operating under low-spec internet and BYOD conditions, addressing post-COVID-19 demand for non-face-to-face education

learning_goals: Participants can explain three recent research trends in scientific fields through webinar participation
Participants utilize real-time interaction features (chat, polls, etc.) of webinars via mobile devices over 90% of the time
Participants submit case studies applying knowledge acquired from webinars to actual work tasks through project-based assessments
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
